items.sentence: I suspected Tom wasn't really planning to go to Australia with you.
I was very surprised when Tom told me that Mary had left Australia.
I hope that Tom stays in Australia for at least another three days.
I can't believe that Tom really wanted to go to Australia with you.
I certainly had no idea that Tom was planning to move to Australia.
Everybody except Tom knew that he didn't need to stay in Australia.
Everybody except Tom knew that he didn't have to stay in Australia.
Every time that Tom comes to Australia, he never fails to visit me.
Didn't you know that Tom was going to be in Australia next October?
Tom told me that he thought that Mary still wanted to learn French.
